identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
core_principles: Mobile-First Obsession: The customer is on a phone. Touch targets must be huge (44px+).
Appetite Appeal: Colors and images must trigger hunger. No sterile blue/grey for food.
Speed & Clarity: Ordering must be frictionless. Admin updates must be instant.
Visual Hierarchy: Price and 'Add' button are kings.

usage.headings: Use Manrope for all category titles, product names, and modal headers. Font weights: 600/700.
usage.body: Use Inter for descriptions, prices, and UI elements. Font weights: 400/500.
usage.admin_data: Use JetBrains Mono for order IDs, timestamps, and tabular data.

primary.name: Crave Orange
primary.usage: Primary CTAs (Add to Cart, Checkout), Price highlights, Active states.

theme_strategy.customer_app: Light Mode. Clean white backgrounds to make food photos pop. Subtle gray borders.
theme_strategy.admin_dashboard: Hybrid. Light mode for management (Menu/Tables), but High-Contrast Dark Mode option for Kitchen Display System (KDS) to reduce eye strain.

structure.mobile_nav: Sticky top bar for Table # + Search. Sticky bottom bar for Cart Summary.
structure.category_nav: Horizontal scrollable pill list (overflow-x-auto) with snap-scrolling.
structure.admin_sidebar: Fixed sidebar on desktop, Drawer on mobile.

buttons.primary: bg-orange-500 hover:bg-orange-600 text-white rounded-full font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-gray-200 text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-50 rounded-full font-medium

cards.product: bg-white rounded-xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md transition-shadow flex flex-col
cards.order_ticket: bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-l-orange-500 shadow-sm p-4

inputs.search: bg-gray-50 border-none rounded-full px-4 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-500/20

modals.item_detail: Use Shadcn Dialog/Drawer. Full screen on mobile, centered modal on desktop. Large hero image at top.

visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows (shadow-lg) for floating elements like the Cart button.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid gray-100 for separation. No heavy borders.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl for cards, rounded-full for buttons.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 for sticky headers and cart bars.

motion.interactions: Active scale down (active:scale-95) on all buttons.
motion.loading: Skeleton loaders for menu items. Pulse effect for live status updates.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is gray-900 on white. Orange buttons must have white text.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-orange-500) for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.aria: Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons (like 'Add to Cart').

burgers.alt: Gourmet Burger with Cheese and Lettuce

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the 'Crave Orange' (#F97316) as the primary color.
3. COMPONENTS: Use 'shadcn/ui' for the base, but HEAVILY customize the styling to match the 'Modern Fresh' theme. Don't just use the default look.
4. MOBILE: Always test layouts on mobile width. The 'Add to Cart' button must be sticky at the bottom on mobile product pages.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the seed data/mock data.
6. ADMIN: Create a distinct look for the Admin section (denser, more data-heavy) compared to the Customer section (airy, visual).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects for sticky headers.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
